mean_cn: adj. 人口统计学的，人口学的
mean_en: of or relating to the study of changes that occur in large groups of people over a period of time :of or relating to demography
word_etyma: demo人民+graph写，记录+ic…的 → 人口统计的
sentence: Worldwide demographic trends predict that the population will top out at about 9 billion.
sentence_trans: 据世界人口统计趋势预计，世界人口将高达约90亿。
